extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2023-2829 or CVE-2023-2911 by retrieving the installed BIND version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2023-2829 or CVE-2023-2911?

extracted_playbook.title: Update BIND to the Latest Recommended Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the BIND system to the latest recommended version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which CVE is the system affected by?

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Aggressive Use of DNSSEC-Validated Cache
extracted_playbook.description: Set 'synth-from-dnssec' to 'no' to prevent the issue related to CVE-2023-2829.

extracted_playbook.title: Adjust Stale Answer Client Timeout
extracted_playbook.description: Set 'stale-answer-client-timeout' to 'off' or to a non-zero value to prevent the issue related to CVE-2023-2911.
